name: Easy.Copy.Wiki.baik.fx
description:
with this style ,the 'edit' 'footer' 'notice' won't show in a wiki page.So it's easy to copy something from wiki with this stylesheet

--

屏蔽编辑、告示、页脚，这样从wiki里复制东西就容易了

user.name: tumuyan
